page.title: 09MR.CATTELL (GOLLANFIELD)
page.content: { Mr. Cattell}was born here but his grandfather came here in 1897. Mr. Cattell is a tenant of four combined farms,{ {Brackley,Ballagan,Balblair and {Balspardon.}Altogether it is 503 acres,which is 34 fields.The biggest is 41 acres.The farms are owned by Moray Estates.Two fifths are for grazing and three fiths are for crops. Mr Cattell has got 2 workers,5 cats,82 ewes,121 rams and one duck.The farm itself is 4 or 5 hundred years old.There haven't been many changes but they knocked down the steading and built another in 1962 with grain drying machinery. Mr.Cattell grows turnips,barley,oats and oil seed grape.Balspardon is a mixed arable farm.
